remarks: Absorption of the trace of a composition.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Jul-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
trlcoabs.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
trlcoabs.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
trlcoabs.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
trlcoabs.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.

trlcoabs2N $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> ( ( F ` P ) .\/ ( R ` ( G o. `' F ) ) ) = ( ( F ` P ) .\/ ( G ` P ) ) ) $.
